original_text: and raised us up with him and seated us with him in the heavenly places in Christ Jesus,
korean_text: 또 함께 일으키사 그리스도 예수 안에서 함께 하늘에 앉히시니

sentences.original_text: and raised us up with him
and seated us with him in the heavenly places
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 함께 하늘의 처소에 우리를 앉히시사
